item.title: Why you should experience being self-employed
item.description: In someone’s employment life, she/he dreams of having her/his own company to beat the thoughts of having a manager or a boss. You know the promise of being your own boss, handling your own time, and $$$ - who wouldn’t want that? It’s “relatively” easy to establish a company compare to the last decades - thanks to technology. There are also a lot of avenues to profit from “the gig economy” that sometimes get big and would need a team to work on.
